Package drcl.intserv

Class Summary
Admission This class is equipped on Scheduler to enable runtime admission control on defines a unified interface for other protocols (such as QoS-based routing and resource management protocols) to make/modify/release a reservation, and to access installed reservations.
IntServToS  
NamTrace The class for generating NAM traces for IntServ packets.
QoSRequirement The QoS included is listed below: End-to-End Delay Inter-Destination Jitter Inter-Packet Jitter Minimum Bandwidth Packet Loss Rate
RspecTranslator RspecTranslator resides in an end system (e.g., the "QoS Broker") to translate the QoS requirement and the path Adspec originating from the sender to the Rspec, which is then used by the resource management protocol to set up the resource along the path.
Scheduler The information unit a scheduler deals with in our architecture is "flow".
SchedulerConfig The SchedulerConfiguration contract.
SchedulerConfig.Message  
SpecAd  
SpecFlow  
SpecR
